text: Yarabemereye Umuremyi wabo, yuko mu vy’ukuri ntazotakaza ingoga z’uwugira ingoga muri mwebwe yaba umugabo canke umugore, mwebwe kuri mwebwe, rero abimutse canke abirukanywe mu bisagara vyabo n’ukubabazwa munzira yanje n’ukurwana bagatako n’ukwicwa bakicwa, mu vyukuri nzoba hanagurira amakosa yabo kandi nzobinjiza mumirima icamwo inzuzi imbere yabo, iyo niyo mpembo izoba ivuye ku Mana, nayo iwe niho hari impembo nziza
